verses.text: \w When|strong="H3068"\w* Israel went \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Egypt, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* house \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Jacob \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* barbarous people:
Judea \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* sanctuary, Israel \w his|strong="H3068"\w* dominion.
\w The|strong="H3068"\w* sea saw \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fled: Jordan \w was|strong="H8034"\w* turned back.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* mountains skipped \w like|strong="H8064"\w* rams, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hills \w like|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* lambs \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* flock.

\w What|strong="H4310"\w* ailed thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* thou sea, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* thou didst flee: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Jordan, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* thou wast turned back?

Ye mountains, \w that|strong="H7200"\w* ye skipped \w like|strong="H0776"\w* rams, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* ye hills, \w like|strong="H0776"\w* lambs \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* flock?

\w At|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* presence \w of|strong="H6083"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* Lord \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w earth|strong="H6083"\w* was moved, \w at|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* presence \w of|strong="H6083"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* God \w of|strong="H6083"\w* Jacob:

\w Who|strong="H3427"\w* turned \w the|strong="H5973"\w* rock into pools \w of|strong="H3427"\w* water, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* stony hill into fountains \w of|strong="H3427"\w* waters.

\w Not|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* us, \w O|strong="H3050"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3050"\w*, \w not|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* us; but \w to|strong="H1004"\w* thy name give glory.
For thy mercy, and for thy truth’s sake: lest the gentiles should say: Where is their God?
But our God is in heaven: he hath done all things whatsoever he would.
The idols of the gentiles are silver and gold, the works of the hands of men.
They have mouths and speak not: they have eyes and see not.
They have ears and hear not: they have noses and smell not.
They have hands and feel not: they have feet and walk not: neither shall they cry out through their throat.
Let them that make them become like unto them: and all such as trust in them.
The house of Israel hath hoped in the Lord: he is their helper and their protector.
The house of Aaron hath hoped in the Lord: he is their helper and their protector.
They that fear the Lord hath hoped in the Lord: he is their helper and their protector.
The Lord hath been mindful of us, and hath blessed us. He hath blessed the house of Israel: he hath blessed the house of Aaron.
He hath blessed all that fear the Lord, both little and great.
May the Lord add blessings upon you: upon you, and upon your children.
Blessed be you of the Lord, who made heaven and earth.
The heaven of heaven is the Lord’s: but the earth he has given to the children of men.
The dead shall not praise thee, O Lord: nor any of them that go down to hell.
But we that live bless the Lord: from this time now and for ever.
